package org.mule.providers.legstar.test.lsfileal;
import org.mule.providers.legstar.transformers.AbstractJavaToHostMuleTransformer;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.lsfileal.RequestParms;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.lsfileal.bind.RequestParmsTransformers;

/**
 * RequestParms to Host Byte Array Mule Transformer.
 * <p/>
 * <code>RequestParmsToHostMuleTransformer</code> takes a RequestParms object as input
 * and turns it into a byte array in host format (EBCDIC), ready
 * to be sent to a target Mainframe.
 * <p/> 
 * Class generated by LegStar Mule Component generator.
 */
public class RequestParmsToHostMuleTransformer extends AbstractJavaToHostMuleTransformer {

    /**
     * Constructs the transformer. Source is a RequestParms object and result
     * will be a byte array.
     */
    public RequestParmsToHostMuleTransformer() {
        super(new RequestParmsTransformers());
        registerSourceType(RequestParms.class);
    }


}
